nodes.text: The Third Cadence was a subject taught to Jedi students. Jedi Master Douglas Sunvale told the prodigy Vernestra Rwoh, who had risen to the rank of Jedi Knight at the age of fifteen, that when he was her age he had still been trying to figure out the Third Cadence, and that he was proud to get a chance to work with her. After Sunvale's death in an attack on the cruiser Steady Wing, Rwoh remembered his words.
